Rules.InvariantScript:
Search(//Filter the 'SAP Accelerator Search Histories' dataverse entity based upon the 'Object Type' value that you will to filter/display in the combo box.
Sort(
    Filter(
        'SAP Accelerator Search Histories',
        'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Accelerator Search Histories)'.Requisition,
        'SAP Accelerator Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History'//View in Dataverse specifically designed to only returned records within a timeframe
    ),
    'Last Searched On',
    SortOrder.Descending
),cmbCommandBarRecentSearch.SearchText,"mpa_name","mpa_objectid")
